entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:49 p.m. EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or snow near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
